content.content: Just a fun proposal: what if milestone achieving EIP like EIP 1559 had NFT art like a book cover similar to Stripe Press. Fundamental pricing research in Ethereum’s space is more broadly applicable. Shareable links with visually appealing metadata and self-contained research that allows for extensions might be good marketing for institutional investor buy-in.
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes the creation of NFT art for milestone achieving EIPs, similar to Stripe Press book covers. The proposal suggests that visually appealing metadata and self-contained research could be good marketing for institutional investor buy-in. The post explains the proposal and invites constructive criticism and extensions. The post also advertises the proposal and extends it to potential collaborators.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
